title: Denis Coins
author: Denis Coins
created_time: September 05, 2023, 01:44:33 PMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 05:27:37 AM by Denis Coins

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Well, at least you bought a copper membership and made a decent OP. It's just that we see too many cheap presentations and in such a competitive environment it's hard to stand out if you don't do things right. I see on the one hand that you have KYC which I don't like in cryptocurrency casinos, but more and more casinos are implementing it, and also responsible gaming features, such as auto-exclusion which I believe should be mandatory for any casino.I guess if you know the forum you know that the best way to popularize the casino is to run a signature campaign. You have a lot of reliable managers that can run it for you.

comments.author: Denis Coins

It's just that we see too many cheap presentations and in such a competitive environment it's hard to stand out if you don't do things right. I see on the one hand that you have KYC which I don't like in cryptocurrency casinos, but more and more casinos are implementing it, and also responsible gaming features, such as auto-exclusion which I believe should be mandatory for any casino.I guess if you know the forum you know that the best way to popularize the casino is to run a signature campaign. You have a lot of reliable managers that can run it for you.Little Mouse has provided us with guidance to initiate this topic. We are planning to launch a signature campaign and additional promotional activities in the near future. As for the KYC, we will relay the message to the team for alternative solutions. It's not mandatory. Only applied when there's something suspicious.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: I'm curious what's the first coin you listed with "J" symbol, it's your own coin? I check it's JET.Your casino load faster, accept various crypto, faucet, interesting VIP level, have many promotion, have many games and you have a gambling license, so I believe people will interested with your casino.

comments.author: Denis Coins
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on September 05, 2023, 02:18:36 PMI'm curious what's the first coin you listed with "J" symbol, it's your own coin? I check it's JET.What is JET?JET (JET Coin) is a special currency launched by coins.game. You can play games and use all other services of our website with JET Coin.How to get JET?You can get JET through deposit bonuses, spinning the wheel of luck, participating in tournaments and other events. You can also exchange your JET balance for other available currencies through the Coins Swap feature in your wallet.How to unlock JET?JET obtained with bonuses must be proportionally unlocked with bets.Unlock amount = wager amount * house edge * (20+5)%Different games have different wagering ratios."As you bid, your locked JETs will become unlocked.Once you unlock any number of JETs, click "Take away" and the unlocked JETs will be transferred directly to your JET balance. But no more than once every 3 hours.That`s all! Now your funds are immediately available for use!"Can I exchange JET for any other currency?Of course! The best part is that the value of 1 JET is tied to the price of 1 USD, and you can transfer JET to other currencies at any time through Coins Swap.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: We welcome you onboard. I made a navigation on the casino website and the site looks great. And I was also looking for the KYC and I could not see it so how do you go about it. And also, I was reading the terms of the site and I discovered that you restricted some countries to use your services, why?QuoteYou are not allowed to register on the Website and use our services if you are a resident of Aruba, Australia, Bonaire, Curacao, France, Iran, Iraq, Netherlands, Saba, Spain, St Maarten, Statia, U.S.A or the U.S.A dependencies, United Kingdom. We reserve the right to refuse customers from any other countries over and above the aforementioned jurisdictions at our own discretion.https://coins.game/?vipclub&rules. As a casino, you need more customers across the world so excluding some countries in the world look like a plan to reduce the customer wide to the site. Well the reason will be well known for you.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Basically this forum is the target of advertising for most online crypto casinos, some casinos survive here well and some others disappear without a trace, maybe it is due to the power of fairness and responsibility towards its users as a whole.Bottom line: I have never played at Coins Game casino, I looked and tried to visit it because there was Bitcoin betting on esports there, which interested me, with some sports betting like: Ski jumping fans, football, F1 and so on, but before I go any further, of course I have to see some reviews about the Coins Game casino, maybe that will be a consideration for me to go further.It's natural that a review is necessary for me, as I'm new to Coins Game casino, but here's where I'm a little wary based on the experiences of users who have played there.For example:Review Coins.gameI don't know what actually happened, what is certain is that for now Coins Game is a reference for me, before going any further.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: How often will see new casinos springing up. Sincerity to customers is the challenge because just when you are settling down with them, they disappear into tin air. That is unfortunate, so reputation is important.However, I saw you have everyday bonus and I wanted to check it up but was requested to register, not yet. You would better advertise your casino by running a signature, that could help you navigate through more users.

Seriously, that UI design is on point, and you guys know that a killer first impression is key when you're launching a new gambling platform.Once again, welcome to our community! We're all ears to learn more about what makes Coins.game stand out from the rest of the online casino world. Got any awesome features or promos you want to spill the beans on?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on September 05, 2023, 04:45:15 PMHow often will see new casinos springing up. Sincerity to customers is the challenge because just when you are settling down with them, they disappear into tin air. That is unfortunate, so reputation is important.However, I saw you have an everyday bonus and I wanted to check it up but was requested to register, not yet. You would better advertise your casino by running a signature, that could help you navigate through more users.You are very correct on that,  because we have hard several cases of new casino that pop up once a while but the most challenge is how consistent their become on the long run and this goes along to say that,  the most important thing for a casino is it long term quality service delivery and since the gambling market is a highly competitive one,  a startup need to put in extra work to be able to stand out among others and also being able to establish and build a good community base that will sustain the business. But in general it is better to have frequent entrance pf new casinos because that is the only way we can have the possibility of a competitive market since their are competing with the already existing casino for customers this will make them to place the customer's satisfaction first before any other thing unless if they have shady plans.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk forum!Coins.Game design is nice for casino and games, but I dont like how it works for Sports betting.It is not easy for me to navigate and all events are taking a lot of space because they are all expanded and opened.Maybe I got used to Sportsbet website, but some design improvements would be good.Positive side for me is that I see this is one more casino with MMA and UFC betting options.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Denis Coins on September 05, 2023, 05:42:31 PMQuote from: FatFork on September 05, 2023, 04:56:11 PMGot any awesome features or promos you want to spill the beans on? We are one of the most rewarding casino. There will be some promo here exclusively for our Bitcointalk community.Just explored your casino for few minutes and I'm focused at your VIP program. The level up bonuses seems to be the lowest one compared to other casinos with similar level up bonus. No offense, just saying the truth at least based on my experience in several other casinos. If I look at this point only, I cant say that you are one of the most rewarding casinos but I have not checked the other rewards that might be claimed in your casinos by being active players. KYC verification level 1 seems to be mandatory here, once user tried to sign up (set email and password) and click register, there is pop up column to be filled with personal information. It cant be skipped and I cant do anything in this stage.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on September 05, 2023, 03:43:42 PMQuoteYou are not allowed to register on the Website and use our services if you are a resident of Aruba, Australia, Bonaire, Curacao, France, Iran, Iraq, Netherlands, Saba, Spain, St Maarten, Statia, U.S.A or the U.S.A dependencies, United Kingdom. We reserve the right to refuse customers from any other countries over and above the aforementioned jurisdictions at our own discretion.https://coins.game/?vipclub&rules. As a casino, you need more customers across the world so excluding some countries in the world look like a plan to reduce the customer wide to the site. Well the reason will be well known for you.It’s more of a jurisdictional thing for most casinos. It’s not like they don’t understand the need to be versatile across more nations and getting more patronage but, there is always a niche to it and the level of operational rights the company can get within a place as well as license to operate. Surely, they’ve got some reasons to there restrictions and it’s normal.Either way, having the betting site as not just a casino but also a sportsbook is some means to create an all in one place for gamblers on the platform and that’s okay.Still, I noticed there are over 32 coins that one could function with on the platform, that’s a plus as well. Welcome to the forum and be fair to users.
